Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ NestedTransaction()

storage::ittiadb::NestedTransaction::NestedTransaction ( Connection &  connection)
inlineexplicit

Create a nested transaction on a database connection.

Parameters
connectionA database connection object.The connection must be opened before any member functions can be used.
Note
The Transaction object must be destroyed before connection.

Member Function Documentation

◆ begin_or_set()

db_result_t storage::ittiadb::NestedTransaction::begin_or_set ( db_flags_t  flags = 0)
inline

Begin or set nested transaction A transaction is started if not already active and if already active it will create a save point and mark self owner of it.

Returns
  • DB_OK When successful
  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t. An error code was set

◆ commit_or_release()

db_result_t storage::ittiadb::NestedTransaction::commit_or_release ( db_flags_t  flags = 0)
inline

Release a savepoint or comit a transaction A savepoint is released if created else commit the transaction.

Returns
  • DB_OK When successful
  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t. An error code was set

◆ abort_or_rollback()

db_result_t storage::ittiadb::NestedTransaction::abort_or_rollback ( db_flags_t  flags = 0)
inline

Abort or rollback the nested transaction A transaction is aborted is no savepoint is created else savepoint is rolledback.

Returns
  • DB_OK
  • DB_FAIL A result of failure for functions that return db_result_t. An error code was set

◆ isActive()

bool storage::ittiadb::NestedTransaction::isActive ( ) const
inline

Determines whether a nested transaction is active.

Returns
  • True A nested tranaction is active
  • False A nested transactive is not active
  • Assert on -1 return of primary transaction associated with connection returns -1
